alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN AITKIN, EAST CENTRAL CASS AND NORTHEASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Swatara, to near Deerwood, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mille Lacs Lake and Malmo around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Palisade, Big Sandy Lake and Libby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
